summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 GMC ACADIA. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE STRUTS ON THE VEHICLE FAILED AND CAUSED A BOUNCING CONDITION ON THE FRONT END OF THE VEHICLE. VAN CHEVROLET IN KANSAS CITY, MISSOURI STATED THAT THE FAILURE WOULD RECUR UNLESS THE STRUTS WERE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND STATED THAT THERE WAS A RECALL ON THE VEHICLE, BUT THE CONTACT'S VIN WAS EXCLUDED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 52,800.
